title: JeromeTash
author: JeromeTash
content: Does anyone know any good and trusted Portfolio manager app (preferably Android) that can support importation of API Keys for MEXC trading platform to enable tracking for futures trading?I tried BitUniverse, but they seem to support only spot trading.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I tried to search it seems only one Crypto portfolio manager supports Mecx exchange API. Have you tried to check this https://cointracking.info/ they also support phones check them here https://cointracking.info/app/You can also directly use the incognito browser for privacy purposes and access the Cointracking to import API here https://cointracking.info/import/mexc_api/index.php

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: Have you looked into Delta?[1] They support MEXC, and according to the app's description on their site, it should support futures trading.[1] https://support.delta.app/en/articles/2416103-exchanges
